Tutorials

Welcome to LITESOPH

We start LITESOPH using the command in Usage.

  • Start LITESOPH Project : Open the LITESOPH-Window for the further Calculations.

  • About LITESOPH : Click on this button to see “About LITESOPH”.

  • LITESOPH-Window
    • Project Name
    • Upload Geometry
    • Source
    • Job Type
    • Sub Task
  • LITESOPH-Input-Window
    • System
    • Calculation Details
    • Advanced Info
  • TDDFT Calculation
    • Absorption Spectrum, Kohn-Sham Decomposition or Population Correlations
